attributes.action: Protect Kurds and Alevis in Aleppo – Stop Targeted Attacks Now
attributes.additional_details:
We ask the UK Government to:
	1.	Condemn these attacks publicly.
	2.	Provide urgent protection and humanitarian aid.
	3.	Support international accountability for those responsible.
	4.	Work with partners to prevent further violence.

If this petition reaches 100,000 signatures, Parliament will be asked to debate this urgent issue.
attributes.background:
We call on the UK Government and Parliament to act now to protect Kurdish and Alevi civilians in Aleppo and northern Syria from targeted attacks by extremist groups.
These attacks threaten innocent people because of their ethnicity and religious identity.The UK should not remain silent human rights
